text: I‘m fitting a multilevel model on multiple nominal classes (say string a, b, c). Is there a way to propagate these classes to MCMCChains? Would that be via CategoricalArrays maybe?

text: As in, conditioning based on multiple nominal classes? In that case maybe a Dictionary works. I recently tried this at least, and it seemed to work, this indeed allowed string outputs for the various different classes for a parameter.
